item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven and the nearby area.

This week's location is: Richter's

PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS EVENT IS CASH ONLY

As some of you may know, Richter's is closing its doors on June 25th .   The recession has been tough on Richter's, and so has the summers - so unfortunately they will be shutting their doors.

Richter's is a New Haven icon, with history dating back to 1911. If you've never been there, its a cozy, warm establishment with a beautifully detailed wood bar. (Ok, I didn't quite explain that right - look at the picture. It's lovely.)

Here's their beer description from their website: "Here at Richters we have 13 beers on draft and 25 beers available in a bottle. Our draft beer in available in three sizes: a half pint, a pint and of course our signature half yard. Yep, 32ounces of beer in an 18 inch glass. Our bottled beer is available in ... well, a bottle."

(NOTE: Since this event is scheduled 5 days before their supposed closing date, I'm not certain about their selections.  What I am certain about is that Richter's is just an honest good place with a great atmosphere.  We should all come out to show our support for this New Haven icon.)

 

PLEASE RSVP

If you are a "Maybe", please RSVP as "YES" and indicate MAYBE in the comments.

Your contact is devorah; number in RSVP.

ome early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend**
item.how_to_find_us: We will have some tables in the back room - ask the bartender or waitress where we are. If that does not work, feel free to call the contact/host listed in the description.
item.name: Richters: LAST CHANCE to go!!
